document.full_text: at least 15 people were killed and several wounded when a bomb ripped through a club for card players in pakistan's biggest city of karachi thursday, police said.
document.title: karachi blast kills 15, criminal gangs suspected
lines_and_colors: at least 15 people were killed and several wounded when a bomb ripped through a club for card players in pakistan's biggest city of karachi thursday, police said.
